nodes.text: Hover platforms were a type of antigrav technology that existed during the High Republic Era. While assisting civilians in Bralanak City during an Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster at Trymant IV, Jedi Padawan Lula Talisola was alerted to debris heading towards a building with people on the roof. She told fellow apprentices Bibs and Qort to follow her and Farzala Tarabal with their hover platform to assist in saving the civilians.
